Package org.moera.lib.node.types.notifications

Class Notification

java.lang.Object
org.moera.lib.node.types.notifications.Notification
All Implemented Interfaces:
Cloneable
Direct Known Subclasses:
AskedNotification, BlockingAddedNotification, BlockingDeletedNotification, CommentReactionAddedNotification, CommentReactionDeletedAllNotification, CommentReactionDeletedNotification, FriendGroupDeletedNotification, FriendGroupUpdatedNotification, FriendshipUpdatedNotification, GrantUpdatedNotification, MentionCommentAddedNotification, MentionCommentDeletedNotification, MentionPostingAddedNotification, MentionPostingDeletedNotification, PostingReactionAddedNotification, PostingReactionDeletedAllNotification, PostingReactionDeletedNotification, ReplyCommentAddedNotification, ReplyCommentDeletedNotification, SearchEngineClickedNotification, SheriffComplaintDecidedNotification, SheriffOrderForCommentAddedNotification, SheriffOrderForCommentDeletedNotification, SheriffOrderForPostingAddedNotification, SheriffOrderForPostingDeletedNotification, SubscriberNotification
public abstract class Notification extends Object implements Cloneable
Represents a generic notification that can be sent and received.

Notifications provide basic metadata about the sender and the type of notification. Subclasses can customize fields as needed.

Additional functionality includes the ability to validate the notification, clone it, and log its details in a structured format for debugging or auditing purposes.

      public String getPendingNotificationId()

    • validate

      public void validate()
      Validates the notification structure.

      If the structure contains incorrect data, this method should throw ValidationFailure exception.

    • toLogMessage

      public final String toLogMessage()
      Converts the notification to a string that can be used for logging. The log message includes the notification type and some additional parameters, if present.
      Returns:
      A string representation of the notification formatted as a log message.
      See Also:
      • logParameters(java.util.List<org.moera.lib.node.types.notifications.LogPair>)

    • logParameters

      public void logParameters(List<LogPair> parameters)
      Fills the list with parameters that should be added to the log message. Each parameter is represented as a LogPair containing a name and value.
      Parameters:
      parameters - the list of parameters
